# ImageDown
[WIP] Google Images full-photo downloader

**Not need ChromeDriver installion. It will be installed automatically..**

## 📦 Installation
```sh
pip install imagedown
```

## 🔷 Examples
```python
from ImageDown import ImageDown 

ig = ImageDown('asena kurt', 10)
ig.get_urls()
ig.download()
```
